long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Read about an artist, or your friend who has amazing musical tastes tells you about an artist? 

Strap on your headphones, highlight or type the artist's name, and BAM..you're connected to SputnikMusic.com and their great album ratings, Sputniker also sneaks in a YouTube link for each album.

Go forth and discover great music.

Please feel free to send any suggestions, feature requests, hate-mail, or bugs to divisionmaxdev@gmail.com
